definition: the wording and purport of what one writes
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Reading articles written by native English speakers as they make minimal mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 看本土人仕筆下的文章，他們出錯的機會較低。

sentences.english: In Oates' works, females are always played with by violence.
sentences.chinese: 在歐茨筆下，女性始終處於暴力的包圍與擺弄中。

sentences.english: I wish I'd written the words on this beautiful card.
sentences.chinese: 我多麼希望這張美麗的卡片上的話語出自我的筆下。

sentences.english: Nature in his novels is personated and melted with the characters together.
sentences.chinese: 在他筆下，自然被人格化了，並和人熔爲一體。

sentences.english: When that shall vade, my verse distills your truth.
sentences.chinese: 我筆下的詩歌卻會提煉出你的真。

sentences.english: I identified with every Chekhov character.
sentences.chinese: 我與契訶夫筆下的每一個人物都能產生共鳴。

sentences.english: This paper reveals that most females in Zhang Ai-lings novels have pastoral consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述張愛玲筆下的女性大多擁有牧歌意識。

sentences.english: As such, this paper opines that the professor is actually another image of Uncle Tom.
sentences.chinese: 教授是休斯筆下的另一個湯姆叔形象。

sentences.english: Toward the sky at times, like the man in Ovid.
sentences.chinese: 有時，它向着天空，彷彿奧維德筆下的人物。

sentences.english: Mr Stoppard's characters are strangers in today's Russia.
sentences.chinese: 斯托帕得筆下的人物迥異於今天的俄羅斯人。

sentences.english: There is little, by contrast, that Mr Hollis does not know about his characters.
sentences.chinese: 相反，赫里斯先生對其筆下人物瞭然於胸。

sentences.english: People like Delaney and Belafonte became role models for me.
sentences.chinese: 德拉尼和百拉芬特這樣的人都成了我筆下角色的原型。

sentences.english: Into red, you may write the girl is you.
sentences.chinese: 瀲灩紅塵，也許你筆下的那個女子是你自己。

sentences.english: The bleakness under the description of Wenbing's paintings is more like a castle-like courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 而文兵筆下的蒼涼，更像是一座城堡式的庭院。
或者有點像狄更斯筆下的世界？

sentences.english: That was how Chekhov saw Jews.
sentences.chinese: 這就是契訶夫筆下的猶太人形象。
